ProductInfo.Features:
GW8604H: Professional 4 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime DVR with HDMI & VGA. 960×480 & 30FPS recording, HI 3520D CPU. iPhone, Android Viewing. New color graphical menu. Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control
GW810CP: 1/3" SONY CCD Small Pinhole Camera, 425TV line. You Can Virtually Hide it Anywhere. Dimension: 35.5mm/35.5mm. Super Low 0.5Lux Works Great In Low Light
Package Includes:     GW8604H DVR with 500GB HDD;     GWLED19IN  - Free 19" Wide Screen LED monitor;     2 x GW810CP - 1/3" SONY Color CCD Camera;
1 x GW60CAW: 60 feet pre-made cable BNC;     1 x GW25CAW: 25 feet pre-made cable BNC;     2 x GW12V0.5A: 12V 0.5A Power Supply for Security Cameras.
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Inc 2CHV6 4 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime DVR with 2 x 1/3" SONY CCD Small Pinhole 425TV line Spy Security Camera, Free LED Monitor (Black)
